document.full_text: seventy percent of japanese voters want to get rid of prime minister naoto kan, a survey showed monday, marking more bad news for the unpopular government chief likely to face a no-confidence vote as early as this week.
document.title: japan voters want pm to go as no-confidence vote looms
lines_and_colors: seventy percent of japanese voters want to get rid of prime minister naoto kan, a survey showed monday, marking more bad news for the unpopular government chief likely to face a no-confidence vote as early as this week.
